message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm really interested in the product, but $14000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $13000?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell it to you for $13500.
